data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":"/t0GxYLiPkTtFBuzoPLmLU3HSKEN.jpg","id":11305,"title":"Mystery Train","original_title":"Mystery Train","overview":"In Memphis, Tennessee, over the course of a single night, the Arcade Hotel, run by an eccentric night clerk and a clueless bellboy, is visited by a young Japanese couple traveling in search of the roots of rock; an Italian woman in mourning who stumbles upon a fleeing charlatan girl; and a comical trio of accidental thieves looking for a place to hide.","poster_path":"/f11xq7dBGhz9UDc3dabldAGeXVH.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[35],"popularity":24.221,"release_date":"1989-09-06","video":false,"vote_average":7.286,"vote_count":423},{"backdrop_path":"/cr6ONO83XOr4t33Got8Fk7uyvvB.jpg","id":68540,"title":"Coffee and Cigarettes","original_title":"Coffee and Cigarettes","overview":"In a vignette called \"Strange to meet you,\" Roberto sits at a small table in a coffee bar. Five cups of coffee and two ashtrays are in front of him; he drinks and smokes. Steven joins him. They start a conversation about cigarettes and coffee. Steven likes to drink coffee before he sleeps, so he can dream faster. The conversation jumps around. \"You know my mother?\" asks Roberto. Steven describes coffee Popsicles. They switch seats; then switch back. Steven has to leave for a dental appointment he's not looking forward to. Roberto makes a startling offer, inspired no doubt by the coffee and cigarettes.","poster_path":"/ndGeSVCT1yLl1Mbcvx0yxJPcx6p.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[35],"popularity":6.713,"release_date":"1986-01-01","video":false,"vote_average":6.861,"vote_count":104},{"backdrop_path":"/8kVPLOzuZ1G9EBYxcOrzaHbxCeC.jpg","id":1554,"title":"Down by Law","original_title":"Down by Law","overview":"A disc jockey, a pimp and an Italian tourist escape from jail in New Orleans.","poster_path":"/4IyxoUQ7BB5kcSd7gASe2dTyWu7.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[80,18,35],"popularity":19.572,"release_date":"1986-09-20","video":false,"vote_average":7.364,"vote_count":711},{"backdrop_path":"/9Kfi1QDVGbMzzi06n8c6A789odL.jpg","id":922,"title":"Dead Man","original_title":"Dead Man","overview":"A fatally wounded white man is found by an outcast Native American who prepares him for the afterlife.","poster_path":"/dOvHDs2jlMYL1dMfbFabEwyBNWg.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18,14,37],"popularity":33.834,"release_date":"1995-12-23","video":false,"vote_average":7.312,"vote_count":1515},{"backdrop_path":"/riKGYv1afrSTggw4lKXusjToqYG.jpg","id":883,"title":"Coffee and Cigarettes","original_title":"Coffee and Cigarettes","overview":"Coffee And Cigarettes is a collection of eleven films from cult director Jim Jarmusch. This short was released as a standalone film in 1982, and shown as \"Stranger Than Paradise\" at the 1983 International Film Festival Rotterdam. Yutika is an inhabitant of the city-state of Shahalta, which has recently fallen to a shady minister. Soon, Lupin's gang and Yutika join forces to uncover one of Shahalta's greatest treasures, facing off against both Shahaltan authorities and Zenigata.","poster_path":"/dBdEmUsVX8Kv57xcR1yg9vqwwYa.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[28,16,35,10770,80,12],"popularity":9.799,"release_date":"2013-11-15","video":false,"vote_average":6.8,"vote_count":20},{"backdrop_path":"/2BDZ2ubSUU9AmGTTRS3OP6Wfe4p.jpg","id":45806,"title":"Nothing Personal","original_title":"Nothing Personal","overview":"Alone in her empty flat, from her window Anne observes the people passing by who nervously snatch up the personal belongings and pieces of furniture she has put out on the pavement. Her final gesture of taking a ring off her finger signals she is leaving her previous life in Holland behind. She goes to Ireland, where she chooses to lead a solitary, wandering existence, striding through the austere landscapes of Connemara. During her travels, she discovers a house that is home to a hermit, Martin.","poster_path":"/4GavXEdItxmP51soWRPPMVRQweV.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":10.321,"release_date":"2009-08-14","video":false,"vote_average":6.4,"vote_count":80},{"backdrop_path":"/dzoLlCiMhraAfCjQuudyVLcl8Le.jpg","id":45153,"title":"Eve's Bayou","original_title":"Eve's Bayou","overview":"Summer heats up in rural Louisiana beside Eve’s Bayou, 1962, as the Batiste family tries to survive the secrets they’ve kept and the betrayals they’ve endured.","poster_path":"/lVSYTzH2mO46XiBBY5wbZlW6wYT.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":10.754,"release_date":"1997-11-07","video":false,"vote_average":6.4,"vote_count":122},{"backdrop_path":"/v5jehNMKQWGGe5ntYiXdenrWcpx.jpg","id":12664,"title":"The Snapper","original_title":"The Snapper","overview":"Sharon Curley is a 20-year-old living with her parents and many brothers and sisters in Dublin. When she gets pregnant and refuses to name the father, she becomes the talk of the town.","poster_path":"/t5sgHOd9NmfyGPWDbv6MoT0f9qM.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[35,18],"popularity":12.533,"release_date":"1993-08-06","video":false,"vote_average":6.358,"vote_count":74},{"backdrop_path":"/1DedlPwn8x2vtBVGh49cjLGnvW.jpg","id":73294,"title":"Closed Spaces","original_title":"Закрытые пространства","overview":"The first Russian emo-movie, Closed Spaces is a story about the newest generation of Russians. Having grown up in Russia's crazy 1990s, an era filled with constant and drastic change, these teenagers have no solid ground beneath their feet. They are trapped in a strange world in which their money-obsessed parents lead senseless lives and even kill each other. Vika is twenty years old. She has black fingernail polish, wears pink dresses, and is constantly depressed. While working at a pizza place, she gets an order for a pizza delivery from Venya, a strange twenty year old boy who lives all alone in a deserted apartment in the middle of Moscow. Venya suffers from agarophobia, the fear of open space. When Vika arrives Venya lets her in and locks the door behind her.","poster_path":"/nbOklvEGJ4q40c8zKxntL6K5I35.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ru","genre_ids":[35,18],"popularity":3.944,"release_date":"2008-08-14","video":false,"vote_average":5.9,"vote_count":19},{"backdrop_path":"/2Cz56FBIOKEGxxFUoEzcFPLEfWv.jpg","id":55835,"title":"Angels of Sin","original_title":"Les Anges du péché","overview":"A well-off young woman decides to become a nun, joining a convent that rehabilitates female prisoners. If ever a person got what he deserved, it's James Urbanksi, an abusive drunk who steals from his wife, Joyce, and promises her close friend Cynthia Kellogg that she'll be the next target of his rage. At a group outing, James bleeds to death after someone cuts his throat.
